lines.text: Pierre, what is it like not being so alive?
It's not so bad; sort of like, uh, spending a weekend in New Brunswick.
Jean, you really stirred things up when you said that Mr. Day could be responsible for the destruction of Canada.
I know. Lucien Bouchard was livid; he says if anyone is out to destroy Canada, it should be him.
When you completely forget something, how do you know you ever knew it?

[overdramatically]
Orca the Whale is dead! Maggie the Cat is a-live!
